        private static readonly StringRepresentationTestScenarios<[model-type-name-here]> StringRepresentationTestScenarios = new StringRepresentationTestScenarios<[model-type-name-here]>()
            .AddScenario(() =>
                new StringRepresentationTestScenario<[model-type-name-here]>
                {
                    Name = "Default Code Generated Scenario",
                    SystemUnderTestExpectedStringRepresentationFunc = () =>
                    {
                        var systemUnderTest = A.Dummy<[model-type-name-here]>();

                        var result = new SystemUnderTestExpectedStringRepresentation<[model-type-name-here]>
                        {
                            SystemUnderTest = systemUnderTest,
                            ExpectedStringRepresentation = [to-string-expected-here],
                        };

                        return result;
                    },
                });
